Key Match Events: Dalton Knecht struggled on defense, but gave another reason to JJ Redick for increasing his rotation minutes moving forward
Pre-Game Insights: JJ Redick upgraded the rookie's role after starter Rui Hachimura was sidelined with an ankle injury
Post-Match Reflections: Dalton Knecht's emergence could be key for Lakers bench, his gravity and shooting ability have been instrumental in Redick's offense
Miscellaneous Highlights: The LA Lakers bench has been disappointing for the better part of this short season, Dalton Knecht, Gabe Vincent and Max Christie had an underwhelming start, but that has changed lately
Others: Dalton Knecht got his second career start on Friday against the San Antonio Spurs, the rookie was coming off his best performance against the Memphis Grizzlies
